# CFArrayCallBacks

**Structure**

Structure containing the callbacks of a CFArray.

## Declaration

```swift
struct CFArrayCallBacks
```

## Initializers

- **init()**
- **init(version:retain:release:copyDescription:equal:)**

## Instance Properties

- **copyDescription**: The callback used to create a descriptive string representation of each value in the collection. If `NULL`, the collection will create a simple description of each value. See [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFArrayCopyDescriptionCallBack] for a description of this callback.
- **equal**: The callback used to compare values in the array for equality for some operations. If `NULL`, the collection will use pointer equality to compare values in the collection. See [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFArrayEqualCallBack] for a description of this callback.
- **release**: The callback used to release values as they are removed from the collection. If `NULL`, values are not released. See [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFArrayReleaseCallBack] for a description of this callback.
- **retain**: The callback used to retain each value as they are added to the collection. If `NULL`, values are not retained. See [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFArrayRetainCallBack] for a description of this callback.
- **version**: The version number of this structure. If not one of the defined version numbers for this opaque type, the behavior is undefined. The current version of this structure is 0.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Sendable
